descriptions.paragraph: Dean is a CS major at UMD. One day he dreams to know why he is here. Maybe he'll write something. Maybe he'll make people be happy.
Or maybe, he'll just die. Either way, he will be satisfied. :)

pieces.caption: The Headass
pieces.description: A senile old dolphin, he doesn't do very much. But when he does, many are surprised. As this old mammal has a tendency to shit himself.
